revised_title: Adhesion Mechanisms of Metals on Crystal Faces
tldr: This study investigates the adhesion of various metals to crystal faces, specifically the (100) faces of alkali halides. The researchers found that the adhesion could be adequately explained by van der Waals forces alone, with a linear relation between experimental values and calculated van der Waals attraction for each metal-substrate pair. The adhesion showed no variation with time or film thickness, except for the thinnest films.
